TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ActionRemovedHandler(object o, ActionRemovedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ActionRemovedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ActionRemovedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ActionRemovedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ActionRemovedHandler is removed from the event.
